Define Documentation

#define GetSPKI ( obj,
spki   ) 
Value:
do { \
    Data_Get_Struct((obj), NETSCAPE_SPKI, (spki)); \
    if (!(spki)) { \
        ossl_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "SPKI wasn't initialized!"); \
    } \
} while (0)

#define WrapSPKI ( klass,
obj,
spki   ) 
Value:
do { \
    if (!(spki)) { \
        ossl_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "SPKI wasn't initialized!"); \
    } \
    (obj) = Data_Wrap_Struct((klass), 0, NETSCAPE_SPKI_free, (spki)); \
} while (0)
